pkgmetadata.longdescription: # InfoSet of various scripts which were used in '19-'20 to operate some integrations in CI pipelines.It previously was distributed via PIP package, now it's a python-based Docker container.# Installation## HandyJust use a docker container, e.g.:```docker build . -t devops-integration-toolsdocker run --rm -ti devops-integration-tools```## ManualBuild a package:```pip install setuptools wheelpython ./setup.py sdist bdist_wheel```Then upload to PyPI:```twine upload ./dist/*```Then install it somewhere:```pip install devops-integration-tools```
